channel.title: Website on Vingenuity
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Vingenuity

item.title: Site Rework Part 2
item.description: As mentioned in my previous post, one of the primary reasons for the site rework was to reduce the amount of repetition and copypasta done across the website. The primary offender with repetition by far in my previous workflow was the resumes. In today’s post, I am going to show my new workflow for producing my resumes that heavily reduces this repetition.

item.title: Site Rework Part 1
item.description:
As mentioned in my previous post, I am going to be spending the next few weeks completely reworking the Vingenuity website.

In general, when redoing a previous project or tool, it’s a good idea to think about what was positive and negative about the original, as well as do a little bit of advance planning. That’s what today’s post is about.
